docs.title: Home
docs.text:
[markdown here]

Welcome to the Computational Plasma Physics resources at Dartmouth College! Here, you'll find essential materials, tutorials, and guidelines to help you begin your journey in computational research within our plasma physics and space physics groups. Whether you're a new graduate student, undergraduate researcher, or visiting scholar, this collection of resources will help you navigate the fundamental tools and practices we use in our numerical investigations of plasma phenomena. We encourage you to explore these materials and reach out to our community members with any questions.///
